text: Dog Justice is a 1928 American silent action film directed by Jerome Storm and starring Edward Hearn and Nita Martan.Munden p.193 ==Cast== * Ranger the Dog as Ranger * Edward Hearn as Jimmie O'Neil * Nita Martan as Babbette * Jim Welch as Baptiste, her grandfather * Albert J. Smith as Pierre La Grande, prospector * John Northpole as Flint, mine owner ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1928 films Category:1920s action films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American action films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Jerome Storm Category:Film Booking Offices of America films
title: Dog Justice
